id_1239.author: id_5686
id_1239.title: Read ME!
id_1239.short_text: This is the How this crap work? article, this explain how to use this page, so please read it, else maybe you do not know how to check several feature.
id_1239.full_text:
Front end page?

Why not? of course this is not for real usage, but for fun and demonstration, what do you think?

Basic information

- This is the home page with search article, in other words this is index.html
- we have article.html, full page about the article (id is stored in url) + you can comment the article there
- we have a dashboard.html where we can create, update, delete the articles.
- login and sign up page where you can login or could make registration (top-right corner)

Working features:

- registration + login
- article commenting
- article add, update and delete
- article search work
- burger animated menu
- message reading on dashboard work
- expandable messages in dashboard and article on home page
- donut chart show correct values
- custom windows for alert, dialog, info
* - you can check your user information in dashboard, click to your name
* - user avatar / article cover need manually upload (name=id.jpg) if you download the site
* - data saved locally in json format, so on your pc your account not dissapear if you close the browser

Account information

Few preregistered user for login test:
username: pista, password: 123456
username: ionut, password: abcdef
username: steve87, password: byTheWay
